channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 68: "Butov's Brooklyn"
channel.description:
http://bootstrapped.fm/butovs-brooklyn/
Andrey has never seen Breaking Bad, SaaStr review, Butov does PR and advertising, adventures in email, Ian drops an idea for a product you should steal but probably won't, Butov's Brooklyn, A Chef's Life.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring! [ Sign up today](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016) and get $20 off.

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 68: "Butov's Brooklyn"
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
Loved it as usual. Sometimes I think I could listen these two guys chat all day long – it puts me into some strange “made my peace with the world” mood

What’s I’ve got from this episode is that mob’s cafes are very stable enterprises.

Read full topic
